definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: In order to obtain steady large pore space framework. we synthesized organic ligand eight.
sentences.chinese: 爲得到穩定的大孔道結構我們合成了有機配體八。

sentences.english: The ligands must also be small to provide high Coulomb energy.
sentences.chinese: 配體還必須很小，以提供高的庫侖能。

sentences.english: It shows that there may be many kinds of ligands combined with calcium in gelatin.
sentences.chinese: 並指出明膠中可能存在多種鈣的結合配體。

sentences.english: Formation and stability of the mixed Ligand Complexes are also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了混合配體絡合物的形成條件和穩定性。

sentences.english: The results showed that L was a tetradentate ligand in the formation of the complexes.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，配體在配合物中以四齒方式進行配位。

sentences.english: Of course, we are going to see whether we find therapeutic ligands .
sentences.chinese: 當然，我們會知道能否找到可用於治療的配體。

sentences.english: Streptavidin has a remarkably high affinity for its natural ligand, biotin.
sentences.chinese: 鏈黴親和素與它的配體具有顯著的高親和力。

sentences.english: The effect of the energy transfer between RE ions and ligands were also discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了配體與稀土離子之間的能量轉移作用。

sentences.english: The invention discloses chiral diphosphine ligand, the synthesis method and application thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種手性雙磷配體及其合成方法與用途。

sentences.english: The two pyridine molecules are cis-coordinated.
sentences.chinese: 兩個吡啶配體是以順式絡合的。
雙亞胺吡啶配體的合成。

sentences.english: Nuclear receptors (NRs) are ligand-activated transcription factors that regulate the activation of a variety of important target genes.
sentences.chinese: 核受體是配體活化的轉錄因子，能調控大量的靶基因。

sentences.english: The interaction of Fas and its ligand is one of the main pathways that induce cell apoptosis.
sentences.chinese: 其與配體相互作用是誘導細胞凋亡的主要途徑之一。

sentences.english: A simple method for characteristics of PDZ domain ligands was established.
sentences.chinese: 建立一種研究PDZ結構域配體結合特點的簡單方法。

sentences.english: The non-metal atoms are called ligands.
That is specifically activated by an artificial ligand called a chemical inducer of dimerization.
sentences.chinese: 它特異性被叫做化學性誘導二聚體的人工配體激活。
